og.description: WILLCOX -- Five independent, nonprofit community hospitals announced the formation of the Southern Arizona Hospital Alliance to improve the health and well-being of the communities served.
og.title: Southern Arizona hospitals form alliance

article_metadata.description: WILLCOX -- Five independent, nonprofit community hospitals announced the formation of the Southern Arizona Hospital Alliance to improve the health and well-being of the communities served.
